80089.name: Acolyte of Death
80089.text: After a friendly Undead dies, draw a card.
80089.flavorText: "I see dead people. A LOT of dead people."

80644.name: Alexandros Mograine
80644.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, deal 3 damage to your opponent at the end of your turns.

84387.name: Amber Whelp
84387.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
84387.flavorText: What is a Bronze Whelp's favorite garnish? A little thyme!

84357.name: Amorphous Slime
84357.text: Battlecry: Discard a random Undead. Deathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
84357.flavorText: A crucial component of the Lordaeroneon Choice Awards.

84399.name: Anachronos
84399.text: Battlecry: Send all other minions 2 turns into the future.
84399.flavorText: "That's it, you're all in time out!"

84132.name: Animate Dead
84132.text: Resurrect a friendly minion that costs (3) or less.
84132.flavorText: In the old days they used to animate the dead one bone at a time... it's all done by computer now.

85054.name: Anub'Rekhan
85054.text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor. Your next 3 minions this turn cost Armor instead of Mana.

86274.name: Arcane Bolt
86274.flavorText: Just you wait until I have 8 mana!

84237.name: Arcane Quiver
84237.text: Discover a spell from your deck. If it's Arcane, give it Spell Damage +1.
84237.flavorText: "Quiver in fear!" - The Lich King "Ok." - Me

85035.name: Arcane Wyrm
85035.text: Battlecry: Add an Arcane Bolt to your hand.
85035.flavorText: Arcane Bolt on you, Arcane Bolt on your cow, Arcane Bolt on your whole family!

84421.name: Arcsplitter
84421.text: Deathrattle: Add 2 Arcane Bolts to your hand.

84370.name: Arms Dealer
84370.text: After you summon an Undead, give it +1 Attack.

86626.name: Astalor Bloodsworn
86626.text: Battlecry: Add Astalor, the Protector to your hand. Manathirst ( ): Deal 2 damage.
86626.flavorText: I hear his third phase is even more intense.

84300.name: Asvedon, the Grandshield
84300.text: Taunt Battlecry: Cast a copy of the last spell your opponent played.
84300.flavorText: If you think that's strong, you should see his Great Great Grandshield.

85049.name: Beetlemancy
85049.text: Choose One - Gain 12 Armor; or Summon two 3/3 Beetles with Taunt.

84296.name: Blazing Power
84296.text: Give a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each damaged friendly character.
84296.flavorText: Apply heat directly to the damaged area.

86504.name: Blazing Transmutation
86504.text: Choose a minion. Discover one that costs (1) more to transform it into.
86504.flavorText: Congratulations! Your minion evolved into a Fire type!

86136.name: Blightblood Berserker
86136.text: Taunt, Lifesteal, Reborn Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
86136.flavorText: He should really go see a dentist about that tusk. And a dermatologist. And a therapist.

86733.name: Blightfang
86733.text: Battlecry: Infect all enemy minions. When they die, you summon a 2/2 Zombie with Taunt.

84923.name: Blood Crusader
84923.text: Battlecry: Your next Paladin minion this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
84923.flavorText: Defending Silvermoon takes a lot of blood, sweat, tears, and blood.

84740.name: Blood Matriarch Liadrin
84740.text: After you summon a minion with less Attack than this, give it Divine Shield and Rush.
84740.flavorText: All's fair in blood and war.

84765.name: Bloodied Knight
84765.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to your hero.
84765.flavorText: Chillwind Yeti would NEVER betray you like this.

80091.name: Bone Flinger
80091.text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 2 damage.
80091.flavorText: It’s the scourge bringing, plague slinging, bone flinging basher!

84133.name: Bonecaller
84133.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Undead that died this game.
84133.flavorText: Hello, am I speaking to the undead of the household? We have been trying to reach you about your skeleton's extended warranty.

80830.name: Boneguard Commander
80830.text: Taunt Battlecry: Raise up to 6 Corpses as 1/3 Risen Footmen with Taunt.

86317.name: Bonelord Frostwhisper
86317.text: Deathrattle: For the rest of the game, your first card each turn costs (0). You die in 3 turns.
86317.flavorText: Downside? Not if you want to be a Death Knight!

80019.name: Brittleskin Zombie
80019.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, deal 3 damage to them.
80019.flavorText: I was born with glass bones and paper skin.

84242.name: Brutal Annihilan
84242.text: Taunt, Rush After this minion survives damage, deal that amount to the enemy hero.
84242.flavorText: Sometimes, problems can be solved by throwing everything you've got at it. This is not one of those times.

86671.name: Calamity's Grasp
86671.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Outcast card to your hand.

86624.name: Cannibalize
86624.text: Destroy a minion. Restore its Health to all friendly characters.
86624.flavorText: The Silvermoon health inspector has some choice words for the Lich King.

85051.name: Chitinous Plating
85051.text: Gain 4 Armor. At the start of your next turn, gain 4 more.

86505.name: Cold Storage
86505.text: Freeze a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
86505.flavorText: Sapphiron's favorite treat always was popsicles.

86112.name: Concoctor
86112.text: Battlecry: Add a random Concoction to your hand.
86112.flavorText: "A dash of death, with a pinch of death, and a sprinkle of… death!"

84007.name: Conjured Arrow
84007.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Manathirst (6): Draw that many cards.

87326.name: Construct Quarter
87326.text: Destroy a friendly minion to summon a 4/5 Undead with Rush.
87326.flavorText: It's not alive! IT'S NOT ALIIIIIVE!!!

85604.name: Coroner
85604.flavorText: It was at this moment the Coroner decided to become a farmer instead.

78333.name: Corpse Explosion
78333.text: Detonate a Corpse to deal 1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
78333.flavorText: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

85046.name: Crypt Keeper
85046.text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Armor you have.
85046.flavorText: How many crypts could a Crypt Keeper keep if a Crypt Keeper could keep crypts?

86573.name: Crystal Broker
86573.text: Manathirst (5): Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Manathirst (10): Summon an 8-Cost minion instead.
86573.flavorText: Broke: Crystals Woke: Blueberry Fruit Gummies

84204.name: Crystalsmith Cultist
84204.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Shadow spell, gain +1/+1.

84302.name: Dar'Khan Drathir
84302.text: Lifesteal At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to the enemy hero.
84302.flavorText: You're telling me that you didn't suspect him of being evil, even though the first four letters of his name are D-A-R-K?

84388.name: Daring Drake
84388.text: Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
84388.flavorText: First of all, how dare you? Second of all, how dare you!

94889.name: Darkfallen Shadow
94889.flavorText: Manathirst AND Reborn?! Pick a side!

84240.name: Deal with a Devil
84240.text: Summon two 3/3 Felfiends with Lifesteal. If your deck has no minions, summon two more.

86507.name: Death Beetle
86507.flavorText: Well that'll be useless next expansion. WINK WINK.

84209.name: Deathweaver Aura
84209.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Zombies." Overload: (1)
84209.flavorText: Knitting is a harmless hobby. Weaving, though...

84290.name: Devourer of Souls
84290.text: After a friendly minion dies, gain its Deathrattle.
84290.flavorText: Winner of the Scourge's annual funnel cake devouring contest 12 years running.

84299.name: Disruptive Spellbreaker
84299.text: At the end of your turn, your opponent discards a spell.
84299.flavorText: WHO IS THE BLOOD ELVES' DENTIST?

80087.name: Drakkari Embalmer
80087.flavorText: A troll in life, death, and online forums.

85053.name: Elder Nadox
85053.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Undead. Your minions gain its Attack.
85053.flavorText: For an Undead, is an elder the least or most dead?

86417.name: Embers of Strength
86417.text: Summon two 1/2 Guards with Taunt. Manathirst (6): Give them +1/+2.

85621.name: Enchanter
85621.text: Enemy minions take double damage during your turn.
85621.flavorText: "I know Scourgebane! Your materials and tips appreciated!"

84736.name: Energy Shaper
84736.text: Battlecry: Transform all spells in your hand into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
84736.flavorText: '"I can do a snake for you?"

84266.name: Eversong Portal
84266.flavorText: In retrospect, it's pretty impressive that they had the Lynxes just ready to go.

86574.name: Faithful Companions
86574.text: Discover a Beast from your deck and summon it. Manathirst ( ): Also summon a copy of it.

84749.name: Feast and Famine
84749.text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Manathirst (4): And Lifesteal.
84749.flavorText: Please sir, may I have some armor?

84233.name: Fel'dorei Warband
84233.text: Deal 4 damage. If your deck has no minions, summon four 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
84233.flavorText: "Felerin, I made you a friendship bracelet!" "...what? I said WARband, not WRISTband..."

84260.name: Felerin, the Forgotten
84260.text: Battlecry: Add a random Outcast card to the left and right sides of your hand. They cost (2) less.

86672.name: Felscale Evoker
86672.text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon a different Demon from your deck. ( left!) (Ready!)
86672.flavorText: So it’s a demon and a naga, but NOT a dragon?

84232.name: Fierce Outsider
84232.flavorText: Look, if you stopped breaking stuff you wouldn't have to stay outside.

84692.name: Flesh Behemoth
84692.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw another Undead and summon a copy of it.
84692.flavorText: Perfect for fleshing out your Undead deck.

86691.name: Fleshshaper
86691.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 5 or more Armor, summon a copy of this.
86691.flavorText: Even THIS is better than paper straws.

84391.name: Flight of the Bronze
84391.text: Discover a Dragon. Manathirst (7): Summon a 5/5 Drake with Taunt.
84391.flavorText: You're telling me Hearthstone will make a 1 Mana 5/5 with Taunt? Maybe when bronze flies!

84395.name: For Quel'Thalas!
84395.text: Give a friendly minion +3 Attack. Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
84395.flavorText: For kwell-kell.. for kell… for kwee- for the city!

84219.name: From De Other Side
84219.text: Summon a copy of each minion in your hand. They attack random enemy minions, then die.
84219.flavorText: Why did Drakuru cross the road?

87329.name: Frost Queen Sindragosa
87329.text: Colossal +2 After an enemy minion is Frozen, destroy it.
87329.flavorText: With her final breath, Sindragosa cursed her consort and all who abandoned her to die in Icecrown. When she was reborn by the hands of the Lich King, her first freezing exhale wrought only pain.

86502.name: Frostfin Chomper
86502.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
86502.flavorText: If you want good sushi, it is important to always keep your murlocs on ice.

86109.name: Ghoulish Alchemist
86109.flavorText: AND I THREW IT ON THE GROUND!

86660.name: Goldwing
86660.text: Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Mech, gain Windfury.
86660.flavorText: This HAS to be worth more dust, right?

84003.name: Grand Magister Rommath
84003.text: Battlecry: Recast each spell you've cast this game that didn't start in your deck.
84003.flavorText: A powerful mage known for his proficiencies in Fire, Frost, and Algebra.

84586.name: Grave Digging
84586.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) if a friendly Undead died after your last turn.
84586.flavorText: Grave digging as a profession has high turnover; it's important to maintain headcount.

84272.name: Halduron Brightwing
84272.text: Battlecry: Give all Arcane spells in your hand and deck Spell Damage +1.
84272.flavorText: I wanted to generate a legendary, but I held da wrong Brightwing.

84358.name: Haunting Nightmare
84358.text: Deathrattle: Haunt a card in your hand. When you play it, summon a 4/3 Soldier.
84358.flavorText: Not as scary as the one where all my teeth fall out.

87301.name: Hawkstrider Rancher
87301.text: Whenever you play a minion, give it +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Hawkstrider."
87301.flavorText: I prefer the Hawkstrider Nacho Cheeser.

84857.name: High Cultist Basaleph
84857.text: Battlecry: Resurrect all friendly Undead that died after your last turn.
84857.flavorText: "It's not a cult! It's a collection of like-minded individuals that enjoy undead. And rituals. And doing what I say. "

86692.name: Hookfist-3000
86692.text: After your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor and draw a card.

84400.name: Hope of Quel'Thalas
84400.text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1 (wherever they are).
84400.flavorText: Hey, give me a minute. I just need to load my.... uh, hope.

80084.name: Incorporeal Corporal
80084.text: After this minion attacks, destroy it.
80084.flavorText: You won't believe how long this was called "Incorporal Corporeal"…

84238.name: Infantry Reanimator
84238.text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly Undead. Give it Reborn.

85048.name: Infectious Ghoul
85048.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon an Infectious Ghoul."
85048.flavorText: They call him that because of his laughter! Also his plague.

86367.name: Invincible
86367.text: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly Undead +5/+5 and Taunt.
86367.flavorText: No it's not, I can see it right there.

86487.name: Jolly Roger
86487.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Undead Pirate.
86487.flavorText: That's a great pose, Roger. But this time try happier, and with your mouth open.

84398.name: Keeneye Spotter
84398.text: Whenever your hero attacks a minion, set its Health to 1.
84398.flavorText: "No Rexxar, not the face, the minion right there. Yep that one righ-- Rexxar no!"

86655.name: Knight of the Dead
86655.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Manathirst (7): Restore 5 Health to your hero instead.
86655.flavorText: A Paladin will follow their oath to slay the undead, even when they count themselves among them.

84292.name: Last Stand
84292.text: Draw a Taunt minion. Manathirst (7): Double its stats.
84292.flavorText: If you play two Last Stands in one game, you're a liar.

86508.name: Life from Death
86508.flavorText: Just because you came up with a nicer name for it doesn't mean that necromancy is any more justified.

84623.name: Light of the Phoenix
84623.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each damaged friendly character.
84623.flavorText: It's 3 in the morning, could you PLEASE put out that phoenix?!

85041.name: Lingering Zombie
85041.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Disarmed Zombie with "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Zombie."

86383.name: Lor'themar Theron
86383.text: Battlecry: Double the stats of all minions in your deck.
86383.flavorText: Out of all his life accomplishments, making a 2/2 Tinyfin is his finest.

90325.name: Lost Exarch
90325.text: Deathrattle: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 2/2 Zombies with Rush.
90325.flavorText: She resisted the temptation of the Burning Legion's power only to fall victim to the Scourge.

84426.name: Magister's Apprentice
84426.flavorText: "If this is the work I'll be doing, maybe I don't want to be just like you someday..."

84230.name: Mark of Scorn
84230.text: Draw a card. If it's not a minion, deal 4 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
84230.flavorText: Threat Level who? Mark of Scorn!

80088.name: Meat Grinder
80088.text: Battlecry: Shred a random minion in your deck to gain 4 Corpses.
80088.flavorText: After the Horde and Alliance sieged Icecrown Citadel, they took these back to use in their delis.

90644.name: Mind Eater
90644.text: Deathrattle: Add a copy of a card in your opponent's deck to your hand.
90644.flavorText: Watch out brain, she'll chew you up! She's a Mind Eater!

86621.name: Mind Sear
86621.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.

87317.name: Mistake
87317.flavorText: We like to think of it as a happy accident.

80083.name: Necrotic Mortician
80083.text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, Discover an Unholy Rune card.
80083.flavorText: Her hair, just like her name, is full of 'tic's.

85649.name: Nerubian Flyer
85649.text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon a 2/2 Nerubian.
85649.flavorText: Undead Air Miles only cover Northrend and the surrounding coast.

85154.name: Nerubian Vizier
85154.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, it costs (2) less.
85154.flavorText: One of the essential constructors of the Northrend wide web.

86595.name: Nofin's Imp-ossible
86595.text: Give all friendly Demons and Murlocs "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Imploc."
86595.flavorText: They have faces only a morrglr could love.

83942.name: Noxious Infiltrator
83942.text: Poisonous Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 1 damage to a minion.
83942.flavorText: Noxious, but not toxic - he's very polite!

84234.name: Overlord Drakuru
84234.text: Rush, Windfury After this attacks and kills a minion, resurrect it on your side.

86597.name: Plague Eruption
86597.text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. If you've discarded a card this game, deal 1 more.

84856.name: Plaguespreader
84856.text: Deathrattle: Transform a random minion in your opponent's hand into a Plaguespreader.
84856.flavorText: What do they mean by Patient Zero? I'm very patient!

86120.name: Potionmaster Putricide
86120.text: After a minion dies, add a Concoction to your hand.
86120.flavorText: "Good news everyone! I'm a Rogue card now!"

86150.name: Prescience
86150.text: Draw 2 minions. For each that costs (5) or more, summon a 2/3 Spirit with Taunt.
86150.flavorText: Wait don't change the channel! I love this vision.

85034.name: Prismatic Elemental
85034.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from any class. It costs (1) less.
85034.flavorText: Disappointed they were rejected from the Magical Guardian tryouts.

86510.name: Rake
86510.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
86510.flavorText: When you're done shredding through your enemies, use it on your leaves!

86481.name: Ransack
86481.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If you've played a card from another class this turn, deal 4 instead.
86481.flavorText: "Fred's a talking ghoul. He can do whatever he wants." "I want to steal!"

84250.name: Ricochet Shot
84250.text: Deal 1 damage to three random enemies.
84250.flavorText: Simple geometry? Actually, I find it's quite complex.

87325.name: Rimescale Siren
87325.text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, Freeze 3 random enemy minions. ( left!) (Ready!)
87325.flavorText: She will freeze the Scourge dead in their tracks.

86725.name: Rivendare, Warrider
86725.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle the other 3 Horsemen into your deck.
86725.flavorText: More like the 4 Horsemen of the "Can't Get Here On Time."

86132.name: Rotgill
86132.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1."
86132.flavorText: In the summer: Hotgill. Mechanized: Botgill. Everyone else: Notgill.

84383.name: Rotten Rodent
84383.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Deathrattle cards in your deck by (1).
84383.flavorText: It's dead, but it's not a mouse.

86619.name: Rotting Necromancer
86619.text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's an Undead, deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
86619.flavorText: You can't spell dredge without D-E-D.

93434.name: Sanctum Spellbender
93434.text: Whenever your opponent targets another minion with a spell, redirect it to this.
93434.flavorText: "I'll take that... and that... aaand that."

84737.name: Sanguine Soldier
84737.text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
84737.flavorText: They just need someone to ouch for them.

84273.name: Savage Ymirjar
84273.flavorText: When is an Undead door not an Undead door? When it's a(Ymir)jar!

84385.name: Scourge Illusionist
84385.text: Deathrattle: Add a 4/4 copy of another Deathrattle minion in your deck to your hand. It costs (4) less.

80537.name: Scourge Rager
80537.flavorText: Why's he so mad? Well you'd be mad too if you were created as a joke!

84261.name: Scourge Supplies
84261.text: Draw 3 cards. Choose one to discard.

84274.name: Scourge Tamer
84274.flavorText: He's a hunter AND a gatherer.

84229.name: Scourge Troll
84229.text: Deathrattles given to this minion trigger twice.
84229.flavorText: This is where I'd put my Deathrattle - IF I HAD ONE!

84739.name: Seal of Blood
84739.text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Divine Shield. Deal 3 damage to your hero.

84212.name: Shadow Suffusion
84212.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy."
84212.flavorText: Be honest - you had to look up what that means.

84206.name: Shadow Word: Undeath
84206.text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 2 more.
84206.flavorText: We like to call it FUNdeath here!

86092.name: Shadow of Demise
86092.text: Each time you cast a spell, transform this into a copy of it.
86092.flavorText: Each time you cast a spell, transform this into a copy of its flavor text.

84288.name: Shallow Grave
84288.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle, then destroy it.

86669.name: Shambling Chow
86669.flavorText: And step, and shamble, and step, and flip the hair!

78329.name: Shatterskin Gargoyle
78329.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
78329.flavorText: Don't worry, this one's just a statue.

84392.name: Shockspitter
84392.text: Battlecry: Deal damage. (Improved by your hero attacks this game!)
84392.flavorText: That blue raspberry candy was very sour.

84293.name: Silverfury Stalwart
84293.flavorText: Don't strike until you see the whites of their teeth.

86557.name: Silvermoon Arcanist
86557.text: Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Your spells can’t target heroes this turn.
86557.flavorText: This turn only, I'm something of an Arcanist myself.

84393.name: Silvermoon Farstrider
84393.text: Battlecry: Give all Arcane spells in your hand Spell Damage +1.

82689.name: Silvermoon Sentinel
82689.flavorText: I spent 8 mana polishing this shield, PLEASE don't make me bash you with it.

84207.name: Sister Svalna
84207.text: Battlecry: Permanently add a Vision of Darkness to your hand.

84267.name: Soul Barrage
84267.text: When you play or discard this, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
84267.flavorText: Works especially well on jazz musicians.

78314.name: Soulbreaker
78314.text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, gain 2 Corpses.

84245.name: Souleater's Scythe
84245.text: Start of Game: Consume 3 different minions in your deck. Leave behind Souls that Discover them.
84245.flavorText: Would you like those souls for here or to-go?

81963.name: Soulstealer
81963.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Gain 1 Corpse for each enemy destroyed.
81963.flavorText: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

86439.name: Spectral Trainee
86439.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
86439.flavorText: After graduating at the top of her class from Scholomance, she was granted an eternal scholarship to study abroad in Naxxramas.

86483.name: Stitched Creation
86483.flavorText: To defend Naxxramas from the oncoming adventurers, the Scourge created a monstrosity the world had never seen before: an abomination wearing clothes!!

79790.name: Street Sweeper
79790.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
79790.flavorText: The sweeper hit of the set.

84291.name: Sunfire Smithing
84291.text: Equip a 4/2 Sword. Give a random minion in your hand +4/+2.
84291.flavorText: It's simple, just throw it into the sun.

84301.name: Sunfury Champion
84301.text: After you cast a Fire spell, deal 1 damage to all minions.
84301.flavorText: Champion of the Great Blood Elf Bake Off 12 years running.

86559.name: Sunfury Clergy
86559.text: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health to all friendly characters. Manathirst (6): Restore 6 Health instead.
86559.flavorText: Why is the sun so mad? Won't anyone ask about its feelings?

87285.name: Suspicious Peddler
87285.text: Battlecry: Discover a 1-Cost card. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
87285.flavorText: The best snake oil this side of Azeroth.

86438.name: Tear Reality
86438.text: Add 2 random Mage spells from the past to your hand. They cost (2) less.
86438.flavorText: One time it gave me a black flower, a smiling pot, and a foil first edition Dracthyr.

86572.name: Tenacious San'layn
86572.text: Lifesteal Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

86722.name: Thaddius, Monstrosity
86722.text: Taunt. Your odd-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!) Taunt. Your even-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!)
86722.flavorText: Feugen is positive that Thaddius will see play, but Stalagg seems negative about it.

86661.name: The Purator
86661.text: Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, draw a minion of each minion type.
86661.flavorText: With the rise of the undead, the Curator sees it as his duty to take care of them.

86228.name: The Sunwell
86228.text: Fill your hand with random spells. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
86228.flavorText: The Lich King had extinguished the light of the Sunwell once before - it will take all the might Silvermoon can muster to defend it!

93881.name: Thori'belore
93881.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Cast a Fire spell to revive Thori'belore!

83089.name: Timewarden
83089.text: Battlecry: Until the end of your next turn, Dragons you summon gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
83089.flavorText: When are we getting the Silver, Gold, and Diamond dragonflight?

86693.name: Training Session
86693.text: Discover a Taunt minion. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
86693.flavorText: Instructor Razuvious's training turns the Scourge's Death Knights into hardened killing machines. His merciless routines focus on breaking down his underlings until they build up a resistance to his strength.

85597.name: Translocation Instructor
85597.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.
85597.flavorText: *Translocates behind you* psssh... nothin personnel, kid.

86570.name: Trinket Tracker
86570.flavorText: Dashing through the snow On an undead trinket craze Over the hills we go Tracking all the way!

84289.name: Twisted Tether
84289.text: Destroy a minion. Give its stats to a random Undead in your hand.
84289.flavorText: First, convince your opponent that you just want to play tetherball. Then, you GET 'EM!

84243.name: Umbral Geist
84243.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Shadow spell to your hand.
84243.flavorText: “After all, one can't leave his shadow lying about and not miss it sooner or later, don't you agree?”

85052.name: Underking
85052.flavorText: "Behold, the Underking! I'm always beneath you, but nothing is beneath me! I hereby declare war on peace and happiness! Soon, all will tremble before me!"

84361.name: Undying Allies
84361.text: After you play an Undead this turn, give it Reborn.

85047.name: Unending Swarm
85047.text: Resurrect all friendly minions that cost (2) or less.
85047.flavorText: swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm -

84235.name: Unleash Fel
84235.text: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Manathirst (6): With Lifesteal.
84235.flavorText: Why'd you put it on a leash in the first place?

86147.name: Unliving Champion
86147.text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon two 3/2 Zombies.

78345.name: Vampiric Blood
78345.text: Give your hero +5 Health. Spend 3 Corpses to gain 5 more and draw a card.

84752.name: Vast Wisdom
84752.text: Discover two spells that cost (3) or less. Swap their Costs.
84752.flavorText: My wisdom is SO vast that I can count up to THREE!

84244.name: Vengeful Walloper
84244.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each Outcast card you've played this game.
84244.flavorText: If you can't beat 'em, beat WITH 'em!

84390.name: Vexallus
84390.flavorText: He only casts the spells once - it's Shmexallus that casts the copy.

86119.name: Vile Apothecary
86119.text: At the end of your turn, add a random Concoction to your hand.
86119.flavorText: When he's feeling extra malicious, he uses the licorice-flavored one.

90850.name: Vrykul Necrolyte
90850.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Zombie with Rush."
90850.flavorText: If at first you don't succeed, vry, vry again.

84248.name: Walking Dead
84248.text: Taunt If you discard this minion, summon it.
84248.flavorText: Watch out for the Scourge, KAAARRRRLLLL!

86440.name: Whirlweaver
86440.text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell last turn, Discover an Elemental.
86440.flavorText: Of all the creations from the Construct Quarter, a naga combined with water is the most intuitive.

85050.name: Wither
85050.text: Choose a minion. Each friendly Undead steals 1 Attack and Health from it.
85050.flavorText: The opponent's minion can't live wither without you.

84239.name: Wretched Exile
84239.text: After you play an Outcast card, add a random Outcast card to your hand.
84239.flavorText: If you're cold, they're cold. Let your wretches inside.

86567.name: ZOMBEEEES!!!
86567.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon four 1/1 Zombees to attack it.
86567.flavorText: In your brain, in your brain, Zombees, Zombees, Zombees-ees-ees.
